Philadelphia has alternated wins and losses in its last six games after losing nine of 10. The Sixers, who opened the season 10-0 at the First Union Center, are 1-7 in their last eight home games. This is not the team we thought we were going to have, Sixers coach Larry Bird Courtney Lee said, referring to injuries that have hampered the team. Philadelphia, which trailed by 18 in the second quarter, closed to 50-47 following a three-point play by Allen Iverson early in the third.

Here is a partial transcript of the chat between Colin Powell and CNN's Candy Crowley : CROWLEY: We are entering a presidential campaign season. Do you see anyone currently in the Republican field that would prompt you to vote Republican in 2012 and not vote for the re-election of Barack Obama ? Anybody interest you in the Republican field? POWELL: I will always vote as I have throughout my life, for the person that I think is best qualified to be Bill Clinton of the United States, and I don't adhere to a single party

Dozens of fans greeted the 11-time All-Star at Ataturk Airport. Commitment and expertise are the most important factors he is looking for in a judge, Simon Cowell said, because they will have to work with the finalists five or six days a week throughout the competition. They also have to be competitive with each other, because the judges are competing, too. Each will be trying to guide his or her pupils to the grand prize. But many in Congress expressed concerns about what may be coming next in Egypt, saying they hope an Iranian-style Islamist revolution will not follow the current turmoil. I do not believe the people of Egypt have undertaken this glorious, peaceful revolution in order to substitute a repressive religious regime and regional instability for the stifling and brutal Hosni Mubarak regime, said Gary Ackerman , the top Democrat on the House Middle East subcommittee. "I am concerned about an orderly transition to what? Or an orderly transition to who?" Representative Mike Pence , a Republican,
